title: When I Grow Up-P.J. Style
description: P.J., the purple elephant, is trying to decide on his grown-up job too. There are so many things he likes and the options are none too few! Help P.J. decide what he would like a teacher, a doctor, a policeman, any of the rest. Philip Simpkins When I Grow Up has so many fun ideas to choose from when youre small, you and P.J. might just want to pick them all.
author: Philip Simpkins
